Description:
Armor-piercing rounds utilized by light cannon weapons, such as the Mk6X series. Effective on light or medium-type warships.

Increased effectiveness on armored targets, but with reduced damage on internal compartments.

Type: Ballistic/Chemical
Size: 120mm
Role: Offensive
Armor Penetration: 45 cm
Component Damage: 30 hp
Muzzle Velocity: 800 m/s
Range: 7,200 m
Volume: 0.05 mÂ³
